name: Android
data: {"id":47,"name":"Android","name_plural":"Androids","active":true,"book_id":9,"book_name":"Savage Worlds: Adventure Edition","book_short_name":"SWADE","book_publisher":"Pinnacle Entertainment Group","book_published":"","effects":[{"list_as":"a","effects":[""],"description":"Androids add +2 to recover from being Shaken, don’t breathe, ignore one level of Wound modifiers, and are immune to poison and disease. Constructs cannot heal naturally. Healing one requires the Repair skill—which is treated like Healing but not limited to the “Golden Hour” (see page 96).","name":"Construct","specify":"","specify_value":"","specify_limit":[],"select_items":[]},{"list_as":"h","effects":[""],"description":"Unless the android is designed for combat, most advanced  societies require the installation of “Asimov Circuits,” a concept based on science fiction writer Isaac Asimov’s “First Law of Robotics.” The artificial being may not injure a sapient being, or through action or inaction, allow such a being to be harmed. This gives them the Pacifist (Major) Hindrance.","name":"Pacifist (Major)","specify":"","specify_value":"","specify_limit":[],"select_items":[]},{"list_as":"h","effects":[""],"description":"Organic races often mistrust or misunderstand androids. They subtract 2 from their Charisma when dealing with races other than their own.","name":"Outsider","specify":"","specify_value":"","specify_limit":[],"select_items":[]},{"list_as":"h","effects":["skillboost: [pick1:skill] 2"],"description":"Constructs are designed with a particular purpose. Player character constructs have broad directives such as serving a particular corporation or political faction. This acts as a Major Vow to that particular directive. If this ever causes a conflict of interest, the player and GM must figure out what the construct’s programming requires.","name":"Vow (Major)","specify":"skill","specify_value":"","specify_limit":[],"select_items":[]}],"page":"p12","image_upload":"","image_updated":"2019-12-06T17:01:36.087Z","is_custom":false,"race_value":0,"race_abilities_init":[],"description":[],"created_by_name":"undefined undefined","updated_by_name":"undefined undefined","created_by":1,"updated_by":1,"created_on":"2018-05-19T10:20:22.000Z","updated_on":"2018-12-14T03:58:30.000Z","deleted_on":"2018-10-16T12:40:37.000Z"}
